info.title: ICarry Web API Frontend
info.description: Official ICarry Web API for public store

get.summary: Product details page > back in stock subscribe
My account / Back in stock subscriptions
Prepare the forum topic create model

parameters.name: quoteId
parameters.description: Identifier of the quoted post; pass 0 to load the empty text

get.summary: Prepare the forum post edit model

parameters.name: advs
parameters.description: Whether to use the advanced search

parameters.name: within
parameters.description: String representation of int value of ForumSearchType

parameters.name: limitDays
parameters.description: Limit by the last number days; 0 to load all topics

get.summary: Prepare the customer forum subscriptions model

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Number of items page; pass null to load the first page

parameters.name: shipToSameAddress
parameters.description: A value indicating "Ship to the same address" option is enabled

parameters.name: PaymentMethodSystemName
parameters.description: Gets or sets the payment method system name

parameters.name: CardType
parameters.description: Gets or sets the card type

parameters.name: CardName
parameters.description: Gets or sets the card name

parameters.name: CardNumber
parameters.description: Gets or sets the card number

parameters.name: CardCvv2
parameters.description: Gets or sets the card CVV2

parameters.name: CardExpirationMonth
parameters.description: Gets or sets the card expiration month

parameters.name: CardExpirationYear
parameters.description: Gets or sets the card expiration year

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Sitemap identifier; pass 0 to load the first sitemap or sitemap index file

get.summary: Gets a resource string based on the specified ResourceKey property.

parameters.name: logIfNotFound
parameters.description: A value indicating whether to log error if locale string resource is not found

parameters.name: returnEmptyIfNotFound
parameters.description: A value indicating whether an empty string will be returned if a resource is not found and default value is set to empty string

get.summary: Gets a locale string resource by name

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: A string representing a resource name

parameters.name: logIfNotFound
parameters.description: A value indicating whether to log error if locale string resource is not found

get.summary: Prepare the customer address list model
Prepare the customer downloadable products model
Export customer info (GDPR request) to XLSX
Prepare the check gift card balance madel

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email; null to load all customers

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username; null to load all customers

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: First name; null to load all customers

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Last name; null to load all customers

parameters.name: dayOfBirth
parameters.description: Day of birth; 0 to load all customers

parameters.name: monthOfBirth
parameters.description: Month of birth; 0 to load all customers

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Company; null to load all customers

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Phone; null to load all customers

parameters.name: zipPostalCode
parameters.description: Phone; null to load all customers

parameters.name: ipAddress
parameters.description: IP address; null to load all customers

parameters.name: vendorId
parameters.description: Vendor identifier; 0 to load all records

parameters.name: warehouseId
parameters.description: Warehouse identifier, only shipments with products from a specified warehouse will be loaded; 0 to load all orders

parameters.name: shippingCountryId
parameters.description: Shipping country identifier; 0 to load all records

parameters.name: shippingStateId
parameters.description: Shipping state identifier; 0 to load all records

parameters.name: shippingCounty
parameters.description: Shipping county; null to load all records

parameters.name: shippingCity
parameters.description: Shipping city; null to load all records

parameters.name: createdFromUtc
parameters.description: Created date from (UTC); null to load all records

parameters.name: createdToUtc
parameters.description: Created date to (UTC); null to load all records

parameters.name: washelpful
parameters.description: Indicator if the review was helpful

get.summary: Customer product reviews for current customer

post.summary: Send the product email a friend

get.summary: Gets a URL record by slug

updated_shopping_cart_item_id.description: updating existing shopping cart or wishlist item?

page_size.description: The number of items in each page.

first_item.description: The index of the first item in the page.

last_item.description: The index of the last item in the page.

has_next_page.description: Whether there are pages after the current page.

specification_option_ids.description: Gets or sets the specification attribute option ids

order_by.description: Gets or sets a order by

view_mode.description: Gets or sets a product sorting

CatalogProductsCommandDto.description: Represents a model to get the catalog products

use_ajax_loading.description: Get or set a value indicating whether use standart or AJAX products loading (applicable to 'paging', 'filtering', 'view modes') in catalog

warning_message.description: Gets or sets the warning message

no_result_message.description: Gets or sets the message if there are no products to return

allow_product_sorting.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether product sorting is allowed

available_sort_options.description: Gets or sets available sort options

allow_product_view_mode_changing.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether customers are allowed to change view mode

available_view_modes.description: Gets or sets available view mode options

allow_customers_to_select_page_size.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether customers are allowed to select page size

page_size_options.description: Gets or sets available page size options

order_by.description: Gets or sets a order by

view_mode.description: Gets or sets a product sorting

first_item.description: The index of the first item in the page.

last_item.description: The index of the last item in the page.

has_previous_page.description: Whether there are pages before the current page.

has_next_page.description: Whether there are pages after the current page.

enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether filtering is enabled

categories.description: Gets or sets the filtrable manufacturers

allows_billing.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether billing is allowed to this country

allows_shipping.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether shipping is allowed to this country

two_letter_iso_code.description: Gets or sets the two letter ISO code

three_letter_iso_code.description: Gets or sets the three letter ISO code

numeric_iso_code.description: Gets or sets the numeric ISO code

required_zip_code.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether customers in this country must be charged EU VAT

published.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entity is published

display_order.description: Gets or sets the display order

limited_to_stores.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entity is limited/restricted to certain stores

createAccount.description: Gets or sets the order identifier

from_id.description: Gets or sets the order identifier

Name.description: Gets or sets the warehouse name

customer_guid.description: Gets or sets the customer GUID

email_to_revalidate.description: Gets or sets the email that should be re-validated. Used in scenarios when a customer is already registered and wants to change an email address.

vendor_id.description: Gets or sets the vendor identifier with which this customer is associated (maganer)

active.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the customer is active

deleted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the customer has been deleted

created_on_utc.description: Gets or sets the date and time of entity creation

last_login_date_utc.description: Gets or sets the date and time of last login

last_activity_date_utc.description: Gets or sets the date and time of last activity

registered_in_store_id.description: Gets or sets the store identifier in which customer registered

billing_address_id.description: Gets or sets the billing address identifier

shipping_address_id.description: Gets or sets the shipping address identifier

language_culture.description: Gets or sets the language culture

unique_seo_code.description: Gets or sets the unique SEO code

flag_image_file_name.description: Gets or sets the flag image file name

rtl.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the language supports "Right-to-left"

limited_to_stores.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entity is limited/restricted to certain stores

default_currency_id.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the default currency for this language; 0 is set when we use the default currency display order

published.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the language is published

display_order.description: Gets or sets the display order

enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether filtering is enabled

manufacturers.description: Gets or sets the filtrable manufacturers

page_size.description: The number of items in each page.

first_item.description: The index of the first item in the page.

last_item.description: The index of the last item in the page.

has_previous_page.description: Whether there are pages before the current page.

has_next_page.description: Whether there are pages after the current page.

order_guid.description: Gets or sets the order identifier

store_id.description: Gets or sets the store identifier

customer_id.description: Gets or sets the customer identifier

billing_address_id.description: Gets or sets the billing address identifier

shipping_address_id.description: Gets or sets the shipping address identifier

pickup_address_id.description: Gets or sets the pickup address identifier

pickup_in_store.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a customer chose "pick up in store" shipping option

order_status_id.description: Gets or sets an order status identifier

shipping_status_id.description: Gets or sets the shipping status identifier

payment_status_id.description: Gets or sets the payment status identifier

payment_method_system_name.description: Gets or sets the payment method system name

customer_currency_code.description: Gets or sets the customer currency code (at the moment of order placing)

currency_rate.description: Gets or sets the currency rate

customer_tax_display_type_id.description: Gets or sets the customer tax display type identifier

vat_number.description: Gets or sets the VAT number (the European Union Value Added Tax)

order_subtotal_incl_tax.description: Gets or sets the order subtotal (include tax)

order_subtotal_excl_tax.description: Gets or sets the order subtotal (exclude tax)

order_sub_total_discount_incl_tax.description: Gets or sets the order subtotal discount (include tax)

order_sub_total_discount_excl_tax.description: Gets or sets the order subtotal discount (exclude tax)

order_shipping_incl_tax.description: Gets or sets the order shipping (include tax)

order_shipping_excl_tax.description: Gets or sets the order shipping (exclude tax)

payment_method_additional_fee_incl_tax.description: Gets or sets the payment method additional fee (incl tax)

payment_method_additional_fee_excl_tax.description: Gets or sets the payment method additional fee (exclude tax)

tax_rates.description: Gets or sets the tax rates

order_tax.description: Gets or sets the order tax

order_discount.description: Gets or sets the order discount (applied to order total)

order_total.description: Gets or sets the order total

refunded_amount.description: Gets or sets the refunded amount

reward_points_history_entry_id.description: Gets or sets the reward points history entry identifier when reward points were earned (gained) for placing this order

checkout_attribute_description.description: Gets or sets the checkout attribute description

checkout_attributes_xml.description: Gets or sets the checkout attributes in XML format

customer_language_id.description: Gets or sets the customer language identifier

affiliate_id.description: Gets or sets the affiliate identifier

customer_ip.description: Gets or sets the customer IP address

allow_storing_credit_card_number.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether storing of credit card number is allowed

card_type.description: Gets or sets the card type

card_name.description: Gets or sets the card name

card_number.description: Gets or sets the card number

masked_credit_card_number.description: Gets or sets the masked credit card number

card_cvv2.description: Gets or sets the card CVV2

card_expiration_month.description: Gets or sets the card expiration month

card_expiration_year.description: Gets or sets the card expiration year

authorization_transaction_id.description: Gets or sets the authorization transaction identifier

authorization_transaction_code.description: Gets or sets the authorization transaction code

authorization_transaction_result.description: Gets or sets the authorization transaction result

capture_transaction_id.description: Gets or sets the capture transaction identifier

capture_transaction_result.description: Gets or sets the capture transaction result

subscription_transaction_id.description: Gets or sets the subscription transaction identifier

paid_date_utc.description: Gets or sets the paid date and time

shipping_method.description: Gets or sets the shipping method

shipping_rate_computation_method_system_.description: Gets or sets the shipping rate computation method identifier or the pickup point provider identifier (if PickupInStore is true)

custom_values_xml.description: Gets or sets the serialized CustomValues (values from ProcessPaymentRequest)

deleted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entity has been deleted

created_on_utc.description: Gets or sets the date and time of order creation

custom_order_number.description: Gets or sets the custom order number without prefix

redeemed_reward_points_entry_id.description: Gets or sets the reward points history record (spent by a customer when placing this order)

individual_pages_displayed_count.description: Gets or sets a count of individual pages to be displayed

page_size.description: Gets or sets a page size

show_first.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show "first"

show_individual_pages.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show "individual pages"

show_last.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show "last"

show_next.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show "next"

show_pager_items.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show pager items

show_previous.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show "previous"

show_total_summary.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show "total summary"

total_records.description: Gets or sets a total records count

route_action_name.description: Gets or sets the route name or action name

use_route_links.description:
Gets or sets whether the links are created using RouteLink instead of Action Link 
(for additional route values such as slugs or page numbers)

enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether filtering is enabled

PriceRangeFilterModelDto.description: Represents a products price range filter model

value_ids.description: Gets or sets the value IDs of the attribute

in_stock.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to the combination have stock

has_condition.description: A value indicating whether this attribute depends on some other attribute

allowed_file_extensions.description: Allowed file extensions for customer uploaded files

associated_products.description: a list of associated products. For example, "Grouped" products could have several child "simple" products

product_type_id.description: Gets or sets the product type identifier

parent_grouped_product_id.description: Gets or sets the parent product identifier. It's used to identify associated products (only with "grouped" products)

visible_individually.description:
Gets or sets the values indicating whether this product is visible in catalog or search results.
It's used when this product is associated to some "grouped" one
This way associated products could be accessed/added/etc only from a grouped product details page

short_description.description: Gets or sets the short description

full_description.description: Gets or sets the full description

admin_comment.description: Gets or sets the admin comment

product_template_id.description: Gets or sets a value of used product template identifier

vendor_id.description: Gets or sets a vendor identifier

show_on_homepage.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the product on home page

meta_keywords.description: Gets or sets the meta keywords

meta_description.description: Gets or sets the meta description

meta_title.description: Gets or sets the meta title

allow_customer_reviews.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the product allows customer reviews

approved_rating_sum.description: Gets or sets the rating sum (approved reviews)

not_approved_rating_sum.description: Gets or sets the rating sum (not approved reviews)

approved_total_reviews.description: Gets or sets the total rating votes (approved reviews)

not_approved_total_reviews.description: Gets or sets the total rating votes (not approved reviews)

subject_to_acl.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entity is subject to ACL

limited_to_stores.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entity is limited/restricted to certain stores

manufacturer_part_number.description: Gets or sets the manufacturer part number

gtin.description: Gets or sets the Global Trade Item Number (GTIN). These identifiers include UPC (in North America), EAN (in Europe), JAN (in Japan), and ISBN (for books).

is_gift_card.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the product is gift card

gift_card_type_id.description: Gets or sets the gift card type identifier

overridden_gift_card_amount.description: Gets or sets gift card amount that can be used after purchase. If not specified, then product price will be used.

require_other_products.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the product requires that other products are added to the cart (Product X requires Product Y)

required_product_ids.description: Gets or sets a required product identifiers (comma separated)

automatically_add_required_products.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether required products are automatically added to the cart

is_download.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the product is download

download_id.description: Gets or sets the download identifier

unlimited_downloads.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this downloadable product can be downloaded unlimited number of times

max_number_of_downloads.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of downloads

download_expiration_days.description: Gets or sets the number of days during customers keeps access to the file.

download_activation_type_id.description: Gets or sets the download activation type

has_sample_download.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the product has a sample download file

sample_download_id.description: Gets or sets the sample download identifier

has_user_agreement.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the product has user agreement

user_agreement_text.description: Gets or sets the text of license agreement

is_recurring.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the product is recurring

recurring_cycle_length.description: Gets or sets the cycle length

recurring_cycle_period_id.description: Gets or sets the cycle period

recurring_total_cycles.description: Gets or sets the total cycles

is_rental.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the product is rental

rental_price_length.description: Gets or sets the rental length for some period (price for this period)

rental_price_period_id.description: Gets or sets the rental period (price for this period)

is_ship_enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entity is ship enabled

is_free_shipping.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entity is free shipping

ship_separately.description: Gets or sets a value this product should be shipped separately (each item)

additional_shipping_charge.description: Gets or sets the additional shipping charge

delivery_date_id.description: Gets or sets a delivery date identifier

is_tax_exempt.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the product is marked as tax exempt

tax_category_id.description: Gets or sets the tax category identifier

is_telecommunications_or_broadcasting_or.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the product is telecommunications or broadcasting or electronic services

manage_inventory_method_id.description: Gets or sets a value indicating how to manage inventory

product_availability_range_id.description: Gets or sets a product availability range identifier

use_multiple_warehouses.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple warehouses are used for this product

warehouse_id.description: Gets or sets a warehouse identifier

stock_quantity.description: Gets or sets the stock quantity

display_stock_availability.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display stock availability

display_stock_quantity.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display stock quantity

min_stock_quantity.description: Gets or sets the minimum stock quantity

low_stock_activity_id.description: Gets or sets the low stock activity identifier

notify_admin_for_quantity_below.description: Gets or sets the quantity when admin should be notified

backorder_mode_id.description: Gets or sets a value backorder mode identifier

allow_back_in_stock_subscriptions.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to back in stock subscriptions are allowed

order_minimum_quantity.description: Gets or sets the order minimum quantity

order_maximum_quantity.description: Gets or sets the order maximum quantity

allowed_quantities.description: Gets or sets the comma separated list of allowed quantities. null or empty if any quantity is allowed

allow_adding_only_existing_attribute_com.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether we allow adding to the cart/wishlist only attribute combinations that exist and have stock greater than zero.
This option is used only when we have "manage inventory" set to "track inventory by product attributes"

not_returnable.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this product is returnable (a customer is allowed to submit return request with this product)

disable_buy_button.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to disable buy (Add to cart) button

disable_wishlist_button.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to disable "Add to wishlist" button

available_for_pre_order.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this item is available for Pre-Order

pre_order_availability_start_date_time_u.description: Gets or sets the start date and time of the product availability (for pre-order products)

call_for_price.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show "Call for Pricing" or "Call for quote" instead of price

old_price.description: Gets or sets the old price

product_cost.description: Gets or sets the product cost

customer_enters_price.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a customer enters price

minimum_customer_entered_price.description: Gets or sets the minimum price entered by a customer

maximum_customer_entered_price.description: Gets or sets the maximum price entered by a customer

baseprice_enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether base price (PAngV) is enabled. Used by German users.

baseprice_amount.description: Gets or sets an amount in product for PAngV

baseprice_unit_id.description: Gets or sets a unit of product for PAngV (MeasureWeight entity)

baseprice_base_amount.description: Gets or sets a reference amount for PAngV

baseprice_base_unit_id.description: Gets or sets a reference unit for PAngV (MeasureWeight entity)

mark_as_new.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this product is marked as new

mark_as_new_start_date_time_utc.description: Gets or sets the start date and time of the new product (set product as "New" from date). Leave empty to ignore this property

mark_as_new_end_date_time_utc.description: Gets or sets the end date and time of the new product (set product as "New" to date). Leave empty to ignore this property

has_tier_prices.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this product has tier prices configured
<remarks>The same as if we run TierPrices.Count > 0
We use this property for performance optimization:
if this property is set to false, then we do not need to load tier prices navigation property
</remarks>

has_discounts_applied.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this product has discounts applied
<remarks>The same as if we run AppliedDiscounts.Count > 0
We use this property for performance optimization:
if this property is set to false, then we do not need to load Applied Discounts navigation property
</remarks>

available_start_date_time_utc.description: Gets or sets the available start date and time

available_end_date_time_utc.description: Gets or sets the available end date and time

display_order.description:
Gets or sets a display order.
This value is used when sorting associated products (used with "grouped" products)
This value is used when sorting home page products

published.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entity is published

deleted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the entity has been deleted

created_on_utc.description: Gets or sets the date and time of product creation

updated_on_utc.description: Gets or sets the date and time of product update

display_tax_shipping_info.description: A value indicating whether we should display tax/shipping info (used in Germany)

currency_code.description: The currency (in 3-letter ISO 4217 format) of the offer price

display_tax_shipping_info.description: A value indicating whether we should display tax/shipping info (used in Germany)

name.description: Gets or sets the specification attribute group name

attributes.description: Gets or sets the specification attribute group attributes

attribute_type_id.description: Gets or sets the attribute type id

value_raw.description: Gets or sets the value raw. This value is already HTML encoded

color_squares_rgb.description: Gets or sets the option color (if specified). Used to display color squares

groups.description: Gets or sets the grouped specification attribute models

sid.description: A value indicating whether to search in descriptions

advs.description: A value indicating whether "advanced search" is enabled

asv.description: A value indicating whether "allow search by vendor" is enabled

OrderId.description: Gets or sets the order identifier

OrderIds.description: Gets or sets the order identifier

order_id.description: Gets or sets the order identifier

tracking_number.description: Gets or sets the tracking number of this shipment

total_weight.description:
Gets or sets the total weight of this shipment
It's nullable for compatibility with the previous version of icarry where was no such property

shipped_date_utc.description: Gets or sets the shipped date and time

delivery_date_utc.description: Gets or sets the delivery date and time

ready_for_pickup_date_utc.description: Gets or sets the ready for pickup date and time

admin_comment.description: Gets or sets the admin comment

created_on_utc.description: Gets or sets the entity creation date

shipping_rate_computation_method_system_.description: Gets or sets the system name of shipping rate computation method

rate.description: Gets or sets a shipping rate (without discounts, additional shipping charges, etc)

name.description: Gets or sets a shipping option name

description.description: Gets or sets a shipping option description

transit_days.description: Gets or sets a transit days

is_pickup_in_store.description: Gets or sets a value indicating if it's pickup in store shipping option

display_order.description: Gets or sets a display order

page_size.description: The number of items in each page.

first_item.description: The index of the first item in the page.

last_item.description: The index of the last item in the page.

has_previous_page.description: Whether there are pages before the current page.

has_next_page.description: Whether there are pages after the current page.

name.description: Gets or sets the specification attribute name

SpecificationAttributeFilterModelDto.description: Represents a specification attribute filter model

name.description: Gets or sets the specification attribute option name

color_squares_rgb.description: Gets or sets the specification attribute option color (RGB)

selected.description: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the value is selected

enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether filtering is enabled

attributes.description: Gets or sets the filtrable specification attributes

country_id.description: Gets or sets the country identifier

display_order.description: Gets or sets the display order

name.description: Gets or sets the warehouse name
Gets or sets the store name

url.description: Gets or sets the store URL

ssl_enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether SSL is enabled

hosts.description: Gets or sets the comma separated list of possible HTTP_HOST values

default_language_id.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the default language for this store; 0 is set when we use the default language display order

display_order.description: Gets or sets the display order

company_name.description: Gets or sets the company name

company_address.description: Gets or sets the company address

company_phone_number.description: Gets or sets the store phone number

company_vat.description: Gets or sets the company VAT (used in Europe Union countries)

company.description: Gets or sets the Company name

include_in_sitemap.description: Gets or sets the value indicating whether this topic should be included in sitemap

is_password_protected.description: Gets or sets the value indicating whether this topic is password protected

topic_template_id.description: Gets or sets a value of used topic template identifier

meta_keywords.description: Gets or sets the meta keywords

meta_description.description: Gets or sets the meta description

meta_title.description: Gets or sets the meta title

entity_id.description: Gets or sets the entity identifier

entity_name.description: Gets or sets the entity name

is_active.description: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the record is active

language_id.description: Gets or sets the language identifier

vendors.description: Gets or sets the filtrable Vendors

name.description: Gets or sets the warehouse name

admin_comment.description: Gets or sets the admin comment

address_id.description: Gets or sets the address identifier of the warehouse

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme.
